Name: Kupechestvo
About the game: Kupechestvo is a board game with historical elements. You will embark on a journey to medieval Russia during the period of the unification of the Russian lands and the heyday of the Grand Duchy of Lithuania (13th - 16th centuries) and try on the role of a merchant striving for fame and wealth. Key Features: Interactive tutorial. 6 Scenarios filled with historical events. Battle against AI. Multiplayer. Replay value thanks to various resource combinations. The official digital version of the board game Kupechestvo.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Kupechestvo? Check out the release date (Nov 14, 2021), developer insights from Lamapotato, and a complete game summary.
